languages.text: Возвестив Прерывание Цикла, Коллектив Амарнат вселил ужас в сердца, чтившие древние теоремы чистоты, но даровал надежду прочим. Собрав учеников и рекрутировав серво-воинство с податных планет, он направился в миры Кричащего вихря, к адским кузницам Темных Механикус. Сей Поход Реиндоктринации должен был вырвать из рук еретиков украденные секреты Омниссии, а также в жаре битв закалить секту, трансформировать ее в инструмент, равно пригодный для задач Эрадикации и Постижения. Флот исчез во тьме, и лишь изредка астропаты ловили эхо направленных им сообщений.

In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.
languages.original_text: Возвестив Прерывание Цикла, Коллектив Амарнат вселил ужас в сердца, чтившие древние теоремы чистоты, но даровал надежду прочим. Флот исчез во тьме, и лишь изредка астропаты ловили эхо направленных им сообщений.

traits.locale_text: By annunciating the Discontinuing the Cycle the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity but gave hope to others. Having gathered its disciples and recruited servo-warriors from their feudatory planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex, to the hellish forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was supposed to take the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battles, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its messages were getting received by the Astropaths.

The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its messages were getting received by the Astropaths.

languages.text: 通过宣告循环终止，阿玛纳特聚合意识将恐惧灌输进那些敬畏纯洁定理的人心中，但同时，它也给其他人带来了希望。它召集了信徒，从各个封建行星招募了仆役士兵，来到了尖啸漩涡中的世界，黑暗机械神教的地狱锻造场。这场名为“再教化远征”的行动，旨在从异端手中夺回被偷走的欧姆尼塞亚的秘密知识，在战争的烈焰中修正黑暗机械教，将其转化为用于歼灭与理解的工具。远征舰队消失在黑暗中，只有极少数星语信息被人们所接收。
languages.original_text: In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.

traits.locale_text: 通过宣告循环终止，阿玛纳特聚合意识将恐惧灌输进那些敬畏纯洁定理的人心中，但同时，它也给其他人带来了希望。它召集了信徒，从各个封建行星招募了仆役士兵，来到了尖啸漩涡中的世界，黑暗机械神教的地狱锻造场。这场名为“再教化远征”的行动，旨在从异端手中夺回被偷走的欧姆尼塞亚的秘密知识，在战争的烈焰中修正黑暗机械教，将其转化为用于歼灭与理解的工具。远征舰队消失在黑暗中，只有极少的信号能被人们所接收。

languages.text: Durch die Verkündung, dass der Zyklus unterbrochen werde, erfüllte das Amarnat-Kollektiv die Herzen aller Anhänger der Theoreme der Reinheit mit großer Furcht. Andere aber schöpften dadurch Hoffnung. Nachdem das Kollektiv seine Jünger versammelt und auf Lehnsplaneten Servo-Soldaten rekrutiert hatte, reiste es zu den Welten des Schreienden Vortex, zu den höllischen Schmieden des Dunklen Mechanicus. Durch diesen Marsch der Reindoktrinierung sollten die gestohlenen Geheimnisse des Omnissiah den Händen der Ketzer entrissen werden, der Kult sollte im Feuer der Schlacht gehärtet und so in ein Werkzeug der Auslöschung und der Erkenntnis verwandelt werden. Die Flotte verschwand in der Dunkelheit, und nur sehr selten wurde ein Echo ihrer astropathischen Nachrichten abgefangen.
languages.original_text: In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.

traits.locale_text: Durch die Verkündung, dass der Zyklus unterbrochen werde, erfüllte das Amarnat-Kollektiv die Herzen aller Anhänger der Theoreme der Reinheit mit großer Furcht. Andere aber schöpften dadurch Hoffnung. Nachdem das kollektiv seine Jünger versammelt und auf Lehnsplaneten Servo-Soldaten rekrutiert hatte, reiste es zu den Welten des Schreienden Vortex, zu den höllischen Schmieden des Dunklen Mechanicus. Durch diesen Marsch der Reindoktrinierung sollten die gestohlenen Geheimnisse des Omnissiah den Händen der Ketzer entrissen werden, der Kult sollte im Feuer der Schlacht gehärtet und so in ein Werkzeug der Auslöschung und der Erkenntnis verwandelt werden. Die Flotte verschwand in der Dunkelheit, und nur sehr selten wurde ein Echo ihrer Nachrichten abgefangen.

languages.text: En annonçant l'Interruption du Cycle, le collectif Amarnat provoqua la terreur chez ceux qui vénéraient les théorèmes de pureté, mais fit naître l'espoir dans bon nombre d'autres cœurs. Après avoir rassemblé ses disciples et recruté des servo-soldats sur différentes planètes vassales, il s'aventura jusqu'aux mondes du Vortex Hurlant pour gagner les forges infernales du Mechanicum Noir. Cette marche du réendoctrinement avait pour but de reprendre les secrets de l'Omnimessie volés par les hérétiques, d'endurcir le culte dans le feu des combats et de le transformer en outil au service de l'éradication et de la compréhension. La flotte disparut dans les ténèbres et seuls quelques rares échos de ses messages astropathiques furent interceptés.
languages.original_text: In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.

traits.locale_text: En annonçant l’Interruption du Cycle, le collectif Amarnat provoqua la terreur chez ceux qui vénéraient les théorèmes de pureté, mais fit naître l'espoir dans bon nombre d'autres cœurs. Après avoir rassemblé ses disciples et recruté des servo-soldats sur différentes planètes féodales, il s'aventura jusqu'aux mondes du Vortex Hurlant pour gagner les forges infernales du Mechanicum Noir. Cette marche du réendoctrinement avait pour but de reprendre les secrets de l'Omnimessie volés par les hérétiques, d'endurcir le culte dans le feu des combats et de le transformer en outil au service de l'éradication et de la compréhension. La flotte disparut dans les ténèbres et seuls quelques rares échos de ses messages furent jamais interceptés.

languages.text: Al anunciar la Discontinuación del Ciclo, el colectivo Amarnat sembró el terror en cuantos reverenciaban los teoremas de la pureza, pero dio esperanza a otros. Tras reunir a sus discípulos y reclutar servosoldados de planetas vasallos, se aventuró a los mundos del Vórtice Aullante, a las forjas infernales del Mechanicus Oscuro. Esta Marcha del Readoctrinamiento pretendía arrebatar los secretos que los herejes robaron al Omnissiah, templar al culto en los fuegos de la batalla y transformarlo en una herramienta tanto para la Erradicación como para la Comprensión. La flota desapareció en la oscuridad, y solo se interceptaron algunos ecos de sus mensajes astropáticos.
languages.original_text: In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.

traits.locale_text: Al anunciar la Discontinuación del Ciclo, el colectivo Amarnat sembró el terror en cuantos reverenciaban los teoremas de la pureza, pero dio esperanza a otros. Tras reunir a sus discípulos y reclutar servosoldados de planetas feudales, se aventuró a los mundos del Vórtice Aullante, a las forjas infernales del Mechanicus Oscuro. Esta Marcha del Readoctrinamiento pretendía arrebatar los secretos que los herejes robaron al Omnissiah, templar al culto en los fuegos de la batalla y transformarlo en una herramienta tanto para la Erradicación como para la Comprensión. La flota desapareció en la oscuridad, y solo se interceptaron algunos ecos de sus mensajes.

languages.text: アマルナト集合体は「サイクルを断ち切る」ことを発表することで、純潔の定理の崇拝者たちに恐怖を植えつけたものの、他の者にはこれが希望となった。信徒を募り、支配下にある惑星からサーヴォ兵を徴集した集合体は「叫びの渦」の諸惑星へと向かい、暗黒技術局の忌まわしき中核へと歩みを進めた。この再教化の行軍の目的は、盗まれし万機神の秘義を異端者の手から奪い取ることであり、戦火に鎮めた邪教を殲滅と包摂の道具とすることであった。艦隊は闇の中で消息を絶ち、その感応通信官によるメッセージは、ごくまれに残響が傍受されるばかりとなった。
languages.original_text: In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.

traits.locale_text: アマルナト集合体は「サイクルを断ち切る」ことを発表することで、純潔の定理の崇拝者たちに恐怖を植えつけたものの、他の者にはこれが希望となった。信徒を募り、支配下にある惑星からサーヴォ兵を徴集した集合体は「叫びの渦」の諸惑星へと向かい、暗黒技術局の忌まわしき中核へと歩みを進めた。この再教化の行軍の目的は、盗まれし万機神の秘義を異端者の手から奪い取ることであり、戦火に鎮めた邪教を殲滅と包摂の道具とすることであった。艦隊は闇の中で消息を絶ち、その感応通信官によるメッセージは、ごくまれに残響が傍受されるばかりとなった。

languages.text: Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu'nu duyuran Amarnat Bütünlüğü, saflık teoremlerine tapanların kalbine dehşet saçarken diğer herkesin içini umutla doldurdu. Toplanan müritler ve vasal gezegenlerden hizmaskerler, Bağırtkan Girdap dünyalarına ve Kara Mechanicus'un cayır cayır yanan demirci ocaklarına yol aldı. Bu Yeniden Telkin Hareketi'nin amacı; Hermesih'in çalınan sırlarını kâfirlerin ellerinden almak, tarikatı muharebenin ateşinde dövmek ve onu hem İmha hem de İdrak amacıyla kullanılacak bir gerece dönüştürmekti. Filo, karanlıkta kayboldu. Artık yalnızca nadiren Astropat mesajlarının yankıları duyulabiliyordu.
languages.original_text: In announcing the Discontinuing of the Cycle, the Amarnat Collective instilled terror in the hearts of those who revered the theorems of purity, but it gave hope to others. After gathering its disciples and recruiting servo-soldiers from vassal planets, it ventured to the worlds of the Screaming Vortex and to the infernal forges of the Dark Mechanicus. This March of Reindoctrination was meant to seize the stolen secrets of the Omnissiah from the hands of the heretics, temper the cult in the fire of battle, and transform it into a tool for both Eradication and Comprehension. The fleet disappeared in the darkness, and only rare echoes of its Astropathic messages were ever intercepted.

traits.locale_text: "Döngü'nün Süreği Bozulacak" duyurusu yapan Amarnat Bütünlüğü, saflık teoremlerine tapanların kalbine dehşet salarken, diğer herkesin içini umutla doldurdu. Müritler ve vasal gezegenlerden hizmaskerler topladıktan sonra Bağırtkan Girdap dünyalarına ve Kara Mechanicus'un cayır cayır yanan demirci ocaklarına yol aldı. Bu Yeniden Telkin Hareketi'nin amacı, Hermesih'in çalınan sırlarını kâfirlerin ellerinden almak, tarikatı muharebenin ateşinde dövmek ve onu hem İmha hem de İdrak amacıyla kullanılacak bir gerece dönüştürmekti. Filo karanlıkta ortadan kayboldu. Artık yalnızca Astropat mesajlarının yankıları duyulabiliyordu. O da nadiren.
